## Certificaciones EFPA

![](images/EFPA_logo.jpg){width=300px}

Las certificaciones ofrecidas por EFPA se dividen en tres niveles:

- ![EIP](images/EIP_logo.jpg){width=120px} **EIP – European Investment Practitioner**  
- ![EFA](images/EFA_logo.jpg){width=120px} **EFA – European Financial Advisor**  
- ![EFP](images/EFP_logo.jpg){width=120px} **EFP – European Financial Planner**
